item.title: Configure Vim Test to Work With Docker
item.description: Recently I started to work with Docker in a project, and I ever use vim-test to run test using vim, now to integrate in current docker workflow we need to configure vim-test. For example to configure to run rspec test inside app: let test#ruby#rspec#executable = 'docker-compose exec -e RAILS_ENV=test app rspec'to run inside to already running app docker container. It is very important to add -e RAILS_ENV=test to send envinroment variables and set test env inside the rails app.
